- Maintain records of service and installation activities.

Responsibilities: Antigua, (Central America, Caribbean Islands) Brief Introduction Antigua and Barbuda (English: Antigua and) is an independent island nation located in the eastern part of the Caribbean Sea. The country consists of three neighboring islands located in the middle of the Leeward Islands - Antigua, Barbuda, and Redonda. Compared to other Caribbean countries, Antigua and Barbuda are relatively more economically prosperous. The islands attract millions of tourists each year, and the country's economy heavily relies on tourism. It is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular salaries, a good working environment, and affordable cost of living for foreign workers. Field: Construction of private villas and condominiums Position: Mason Number of Positions: 10 Responsibilities: Construction of walls using bricks, blocks, and concrete Mixing and laying cement as per the level Structural framework as per the plan Coordinate work with the team on the construction site Requirements: Age: 21-40 years. Language: Must be able to speak and understand English fluently. Candidates must submit a video demonstrating their skills in their respective field; they must also provide training and experience certificates related to the job. 3-5 years of practical experience in the relevant field is necessary. Candidates must be mentally calm, patient, and adaptable in behavior. Passport must be valid for at least 1 year. Benefits: Salary: USD 1,000 per month; 6 days a week Accommodation: Free; Transportation: Free Food: Self-sponsored Work Permit: Provided Payment Terms: Payment after obtaining visa Comparatively lower visa processing fees Contract Duration: 12 months; Renewable based on terms. Deadline for file submission: 06 February, 2026 Delegate Interview: 08 February, 2026 (Online)

job_description:
Responsibilities: Introduction to Antigua, (Central America, Caribbean Islands) Antigua and Barbuda (English: Antigua and) is an independent island nation located in the eastern part of the Caribbean Sea. The nation consists of three neighboring islands located in the middle of the Leeward Islands: Antigua, Barbuda, and Redonda. Compared to other Caribbean countries, Antigua and Barbuda are relatively more economically prosperous. The islands attract millions of tourists each year, and the country's economy heavily relies on tourism. It is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular wages, a good working environment, and affordable cost of living for foreign workers. Field: Construction of private villas and condominiums Position: Electrician Number of positions: 8 Responsibilities: Installation of electrical lines on building and construction sites Installation of switches, sockets, DB boards, and light fittings Diagnosis and repair of electrical faults Adherence to safety standards Requirements: Age: 21-40 years Language: Must be able to speak and understand English fluently Candidates must submit a video demonstrating their skills in their respective field; training and experience certificates related to the job must be provided. 3-5 years of practical experience in the relevant field is required Candidates must be mentally calm, patient, and adaptable Passport must be valid for at least 1 year Benefits: Salary: USD 1,000 per month; 6 days a week Accommodation: Free; Transportation: Free Food: Self-funded Work Permit will be provided Payment Terms: Payment after obtaining visa Comparatively low visa processing fees Contract duration: 12 months; Renewable based on performance Deadline for file submission: 06 February, 2026 Delegate Interview: 08 February, 2026 (Online)
